title: Naqiyah Burhanuddin - Director & Academic Head | Educational Strategist & Founder
description: Profile of Naqiyah Burhanuddin, Director of Rawdat al-Quran al-Kareem. An educational leader specializing in nature-based learning, curriculum reform, and holistic child development.
ogTitle: Naqiyah Burhanuddin | Visionary Educator & Director - Rawdat al-Quran al-Kareem
ogDescription: Meet Naqiyah Burhanuddin, a pioneer in modern education. Discover her work with Rawdat al-Quran al-Kareem, Cubs, Fawns & Foals, and her advocacy for "learning through play."

@graph.name: Naqiyah Husain Burhanuddin
@graph.description: Naqiyah Burhanuddin is the Director and Academic Head of Rawdat al-Quran al-Kareem. She holds a Master's in Education from D'Youville College and advocates for the 'power of play' in learning.
